name: AnimatedSubscribeButton
description: An animated subscribe button useful for showing a micro animation from intial to final result.

metadata.title: Animated Subscribe Button
metadata.description: An animated subscribe button useful for showing a micro animation from intial to final result.
metadata.author: pilladipesh33

props.name: subscribeStatus
props.description: A boolean flag to check the condition for the button. This property can be used to toggle the button's state, such as subscribed or unsubscribed.

props.name: children
props.description: The content to be displayed inside the button. Should contain two children - first for unsubscribed state and second for subscribed state.

props.name: className
props.description: Optional class name to be applied to the button for custom styling.
